string-array.name: movie_words
string-array.item: "坚强而勇敢，仁慈且善良。 Have courage and be kind."
"有时候，我们需要奇迹。 Sometimes we need a little magic."
"希望是一个好东西，也许是最好的，好东西是不会消亡的。 Hope is a good thing and maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever dies."
"汲汲而生，汲汲而死。 Get busy living or get busy dying."
"坚强的人只能救赎自己，伟大的人才能拯救他人。 It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another."
"如果你有梦想，就要守护它。 You got a dream, you gotta protect it."
"当人们做不到一些事情的时候，他们就会对你说你也同样不能。 People can't do something themselves, they wanna tell you can't do it."
"幸福里面没有为什么，只有我。 There is an I in \"happiness\", there is no Y in \"happiness\", it's an I."
"我认为纸上谈兵没什么作用。 I think it's hard winning a war with words."
"先生，你可真不是个君子，小姐，你也不是什么淑女。 Sir, you're no gentleman. And you miss are no lady."
"明天又是全新的一天。 Tomorrow is another day."
"你跳，我跟你跳。 You jump, I jump."
"我们是真他妈的走运极了。 We're the luckiest sons-of-bitches in the world."
"生活本来就全靠运气。 All life is a game of luck."
"要让每一天都有所值。 To make each day count."
"命中注定。 Destiny takes a hand."
"你是我的命运。 You are my destiny."
"吃还是不吃，是需要考虑的问题。 To eat or not to eat, that's a question."
"如果这个世界对你不理不睬，你也可以这样对待它。 When the world turns its back on you. You turn your back on the world."
"你，你的气味，对我来说就像海洛因一样无法抗拒。 It's you, your scent, it's like a drug to me. You're like my personal brand of heroin."
"只有你才能让我如此上瘾。 Only for making me want you so badly."
"我不顾一切地爱上了他。 I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him."
"我第一次遇见你的时候你就劫数难逃。 Your number was up the first time I met you."
"过去的事是不可以改变的。 You can't change the past."
"生命就像一盒巧克力，结果往往出人意料。 Life was like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get."
"奇迹每天都在发生。 Miracles happen every day."
"钞票不是万能的，有时还需要信用卡。 Money is not everything. There's MasterCard."
"爱情就像照片，需要大量的暗房时间来培养。 Love is photogenic. It needs darkness to develop."
"要被归为“聪明人”我得去掉60点智商才行。 I'd have to lose 60 IQ points to be classified as \"smart\"."
"从我妈给我断奶后我就没忘掉过一件事。 I haven't forgotten a single thing since the day my mother stopped breastfeeding me."
"有些东西失去了才懂得珍惜。 You don't know good things till they are gone."
"阳光穿过窗。 Sunlight creeps in between the curtains."
"被人遗忘，也是被人记起的方法。 Way to be forgotten. But that's how you get remembered."
"我爱你，一直是，永远会。 I love you, always have, always will."
"如果真相伤人，那保守秘密就没什么不对。 There's nothing wrong to keep this secret if its truth will hurt someone."
"终有一天，你会学会泪往心里流。 Look, eventually, you'll learn to do that on the inside."
"我虽然不是什么好人，但绝对不是缩头乌龟。 I'm a lot of things, but I'm not a quitter."
"我们只要散发正能量，宇宙会证明给我们看的。 Let's just send out positive energy, and the universe will provide."
"还是面对现实吧，我们要靠自己。 Might as well face it. You and I are on our own."
"这家伙还有台新苹果，而我却一周都在吃同一个苹果。 This guy has a brand-new apple. I've been eating the same apple for a week."
"今天可是我们的基念日啊！ It's our man-iversary."
"我都穷到拿肥皂盒当钱包了。 I use the box that our soap comes in as a wallet."
"世上并没有绝对的善与恶，差别只在于强者和无法分清事实的弱者。 There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it."
"你最恐惧的其实是恐惧本身。 That suggests that what you fear most of all… is fear itself."
"决定我们成为什么样人的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。 It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices."
"对不起，教授，我不可以说谎。 I'm sorry, professor, but I must not tell lies."
"巨大财富的背后，都隐藏着罪恶。 Behind every great fortune, there is a crime."
"一个人只有一个命运。 Every man has one destiny."
"你做出了这个决定，这是你的代价。 You make the choice, and this is your price."
"永远不要让别人知道你的真实想法。 Don't let anybody know what you are thinking."
"生活是如此的美丽。 Life is so beautiful."
"那么，去爱一些其他人吧。 So, love somebody else."
"这个世界本身就没有所谓的清白而言。你敢说，你从来就没说过慌？这是自欺欺人。 Only don't tell me you're innocent. It insults my intelligence, makes me very angry."
"伟大的人不是生下来就伟大的，而是在成长过程中显示其伟大的。 Great people are not born with the great, but in the process of growing up show its great."
"不顾家庭的男人不是真正的男人。 A man who is not a father will never be a real man."
"不要说不可能，没有什么不可能。 Do not say impossible, nothing is impossible."
"该发生的事总会发生。 Whatever can happen, will happen."
"从1到10，你的疼痛指数有多少？ On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your pain?"
"乖啊。乖。 There. There."
"成功是一个相关名词，他会给你带来很多不相关的亲戚（联系）。 Success is a relative term. It brings so many relatives."
"上天决定了你的出身，幸运的是在选择朋友方面给你留了余地。 God made relatives.Thank God we can choose our friends."
"聪明人都是未婚的，结婚的人很难再聪明起来。 The wise never marry. And when they marry they become otherwise."
"现在的梦想决定着你的将来，所以还是再睡一会吧。 Your future depends on your dreams. So go to sleep."
"应该有更好的方式开始新一天，而不是千篇一律的在每个上午都醒来。 There should be a better way to start a day than waking up every morning."
"努力工作不会导致死亡！不过干嘛要冒这个险？ Hard work never kills anybody. But why take the risk?"
"工作好有意思耶！尤其是看着别人工作。 Work fascinates me. I can look at it for hours!"
